    Title

    Some text here.

    Another Title

    More text here.

    Layout: Sidebar Custom

    최대 1 분 소요

    This post has a custom sidebar set in the post’s YAML Front Matter.

    An example of how that YAML could look is:

    sidebar:
  - title: "Title"
    image: "/assets/images/your-image.jpg"
    image_alt: "image"
    text: "Some text here."
  - title: "Another Title"
    text: "More text here."
    nav: sidebar-sample

    업데이트: June 23, 2021

    참고

    Exclude Post from Search Index

    최대 1 분 소요

    This post should not appear in the search index because it has the following YAML Front Matter:

    Layout: Header Video

    최대 1 분 소요

    This post should display a header with a responsive video, if the theme supports it.

    Gemified Theme – Beta Release

    2 분 소요

    Hot on the heels of Jekyll v3.3.0 is a beta release of Minimal Mistakes… as a gemified theme.

    Gemified Theme – Alpha Release

    3 분 소요
